page.title: 19A Native of Newent
page.content: During my life I have seen many changes in the Town. When I was a boy a car was a rare sight and most people either walked or had a pony and trap or used the train. The train and ponies have gone and there seems to be cars everywhere it's quite a problem finding a safe place to cross the road sometimes. I'm glad the big lorries don't come through the Town now, they use the by-pass. The shops are better and there is a wider choice of goods, but did you know that there used to be two boot and shoe repairers in Newent -we did alot of walking before cars. There are lots of new people in the area, once I used to know everyone that I met in the streets. I suppose people have got to live somewhere and I can think of no better place to live than Newent.
